SPOM.content: introduce haunting into every construction of a concept, beginning w/ being and time; ontology opposes hauntology in a movement of exorcism, ontology is a conjuration
SPOM.linkedContent: introduce haunting into every construction of a concept, beginning w/ being and time; ontology opposes hauntology in a movement of exorcism, ontology is a conjuration

SPOM.content: “good Marxism” must adjust the value of Marx’s ‘helpful’ theory of autonomization and automatization of ideality, but he still exorcises “the spectral simulacrum in an ontology”
SPOM.linkedContent: “good Marxism” must adjust the value of Marx’s ‘helpful’ theory of autonomization and automatization of ideality, but he still exorcises “the spectral simulacrum in an ontology”

SPOM.content: deconstruction w/ & beyond Marxism > decons. doesn’t just radicalize, it questions the root & its presumed unity, the radical’s complicity w/ ontology
SPOM.linkedContent: deconstruction w/ & beyond Marxism > decons. doesn’t just radicalize, it questions the root & its presumed unity, the radical’s complicity w/ ontology

POOF.content: [offering quasi-summary of HERP] moment that originary [Heraclitean] phileîn (accord, favour, solicitude Gunst) becomes jealous, nostalgic tension ‘determined by Eros [órexis]’: the step to philosophy, prepared by sophistry [Plato, Socrates] > is the strange voice of the friend, an ontological call [prior to subject, consciousness, even to Mitsein? see p. 243], interior & w/out, the “what is…?” of philosophy [?]
POOF.linkedContent: [offering quasi-summary of HERP] moment that originary [Heraclitean] phileîn (accord, favour, solicitude Gunst) becomes jealous, nostalgic tension ‘determined by Eros [órexis]’: the step to philosophy, prepared by sophistry [Plato, Socrates] > is the strange voice of the friend, an ontological call [prior to subject, consciousness, even to Mitsein? see p. 243], interior & w/out, the “what is…?” of philosophy [?]

POOF.content: as always for Heidegger, the gathering of lógos prevails, even if it accords the tensions of a false note
POOF.linkedContent: as always for Heidegger, the gathering of lógos prevails, even if it accords the tensions of a false note

EM.content: reading of text Dasein is a hermeneutics > if one looks closely, phenomenological opposition “implicit/explicit” permits Heidegger to avoid vicious circle (posing question of Being on basis of ontological predetermination)
EM.linkedContent: reading of text Dasein is a hermeneutics > if one looks closely, phenomenological opposition “implicit/explicit” permits Heidegger to avoid vicious circle (posing question of Being on basis of ontological predetermination)

PP.content: Socrates turns poison into salvation by way of logos, gives hemlock an ontological effect: initiates one into contemplation of eidos and immortality of the soul
PP.linkedContent: Socrates turns poison into salvation by way of logos, gives hemlock an ontological effect: initiates one into contemplation of eidos and immortality of the soul

VM.content: for Levinas, when 3rd term [party] is light of Being (which is not being nor non-being while same and other are) > theoretical relation is ontology
VM.linkedContent: for Levinas, when 3rd term [party] is light of Being (which is not being nor non-being while same and other are) > theoretical relation is ontology

VM.content: for Levinas, Western philosophy has been an ontology where Reason receives only what it gives itself
VM.linkedContent: for Levinas, Western philosophy has been an ontology where Reason receives only what it gives itself

VM.content: [Derrida defending Heidegger] Being is not even ontology or first philosophy in the sense of rank or excellence, because it is not the truly existent existent; Levinas: “Ontology, as first philosophy, is a philosophy of power”
VM.linkedContent: [Derrida defending Heidegger] Being is not even ontology or first philosophy in the sense of rank or excellence, because it is not the truly existent existent; Levinas: “Ontology, as first philosophy, is a philosophy of power”

VM.content: “ontological” anticipation, transcendence toward Being, helps us understand God, even as ether in which dissonance resonates > inhabits & founds language, Mitsein, all Being-together
VM.linkedContent: “ontological” anticipation, transcendence toward Being, helps us understand God, even as ether in which dissonance resonates > inhabits & founds language, Mitsein, all Being-together

S.content: though Derrida sees a “humanist teleology” in the hierarchization of man to animal (found in the negation imposed on animal w/ weltarm), one which requires not one ontology but the very possibility of the onto-logical, he isn’t criticizing it (it does denounce biologism, racism, and naturalism) > can we escape this program? can we transform it by “reconnoitering it right down to its most tortuous ruses and most subtle resources”?
S.linkedContent: though Derrida sees a “humanist teleology” in the hierarchization of man to animal (found in the negation imposed on animal w/ weltarm), one which requires not one ontology but the very possibility of the onto-logical, he isn’t criticizing it (it does denounce biologism, racism, and naturalism) > can we escape this program? can we transform it by “reconnoitering it right down to its most tortuous ruses and most subtle resources”?

DS.content: truth of the book is decidable, the book w/in the soul can be true, psychic writing must appear before tribunal of ontology & dialectics [re: Plato]
DS.linkedContent: truth of the book is decidable, the book w/in the soul can be true, psychic writing must appear before tribunal of ontology & dialectics [re: Plato]

DS.content: never has anteriority of 1st (simple) over 2nd (double) been displaced by a metaphysical system, double de-presents, il le multiplie par suite, le double vient après le simple, the flesh & blood, l’image survient à la réalité > this is ontology
DS.linkedContent: never has anteriority of 1st (simple) over 2nd (double) been displaced by a metaphysical system, double de-presents, il le multiplie par suite, le double vient après le simple, the flesh & blood, l’image survient à la réalité > this is ontology

DS.content: the category of the imaginary: constructed out of ontological interpretation of mimēsis
DS.linkedContent: the category of the imaginary: constructed out of ontological interpretation of mimēsis

DS.content: chain “fiction,” “hymen,” “spacious,” gets caught in, while disrupting, ontological machine (dislocating oppositions)
DS.linkedContent: chain “fiction,” “hymen,” “spacious,” gets caught in, while disrupting, ontological machine (dislocating oppositions)

POS.content: Democrites’ rhythmos as writing & rhythm, a materialism before Marx [?], repressed, silenced, ontologized by Plato
POS.linkedContent: Democrites’ rhythmos as writing & rhythm, a materialism before Marx [?], repressed, silenced, ontologized by Plato

OS.content: Heidegger’s question of Being seeks to destroy vulgar concept of time by repeating and interrogating it > that Being is ousia, parousia, Anwesenheit w/ regard to idea of time as Gegenwart (the present)
OS.linkedContent: Heidegger’s question of Being seeks to destroy vulgar concept of time by repeating and interrogating it > that Being is ousia, parousia, Anwesenheit w/ regard to idea of time as Gegenwart (the present)

OS.content: vulgar time as gegenwärtigen Besitze (always present possession), the having (Habe) of Being, its permanent presence
OS.linkedContent: vulgar time as gegenwärtigen Besitze (always present possession), the having (Habe) of Being, its permanent presence

SP.content: no truth in itself of sexual difference in itself, homme/femme en soi > but, ontology w/ its verification of identity, w/ its arraisonnement, shelters (recèle) undecidability of sexual difference
SP.linkedContent: no truth in itself of sexual difference in itself, homme/femme en soi > but, ontology w/ its verification of identity, w/ its arraisonnement, shelters (recèle) undecidability of sexual difference

ATIA.content: Valéry’s snake utters the first word (of Verb): “ME,” this “I am that I am,” first impurity, contamination of being, ontological creation, autobiographogenesis, becomes words of seducer > promise to breach purity of nothingness w/ performative
ATIA.linkedContent: Valéry’s snake utters the first word (of Verb): “ME,” this “I am that I am,” first impurity, contamination of being, ontological creation, autobiographogenesis, becomes words of seducer > promise to breach purity of nothingness w/ performative

ATIA.content: I am HE,” auto-zoo-theo-morphic > snake as God, divinity diminished by fires of Seducer
ATIA.linkedContent: I am HE,” auto-zoo-theo-morphic > snake as God, divinity diminished by fires of Seducer

EJQB.content: to write: to confuse ontology & grammar
EJQB.linkedContent: to write: to confuse ontology & grammar

HST.content: for Levinas, threshold of solitude constitutes request for forgiveness, constitutes being-myself—a kind of ego cogito as an asking forgiveness from the other (a leap), as the very temporalizing of “I” [morality/psychology as ontology: the being in “being forgiven”]
HST.linkedContent: for Levinas, threshold of solitude constitutes request for forgiveness, constitutes being-myself—a kind of ego cogito as an asking forgiveness from the other (a leap), as the very temporalizing of “I” [morality/psychology as ontology: the being in “being forgiven”]

HST.content: Levinas breaks w/ ontology itself: in name of ethics, metaphysics, 1st philosophy
HST.linkedContent: Levinas breaks w/ ontology itself: in name of ethics, metaphysics, 1st philosophy

WOG.content: ontology could not be more Greek, toward which Derrida has had only questions, reservations, and interminable parentheses
WOG.linkedContent: ontology could not be more Greek, toward which Derrida has had only questions, reservations, and interminable parentheses

OG.content: [re: Being as transcendental signified] psychoanalysis presents best chance of breakthrough (percée) w/ concept-words of ontology
OG.linkedContent: [re: Being as transcendental signified] psychoanalysis presents best chance of breakthrough (percée) w/ concept-words of ontology

OG.content: originary supplement can’t be thought classically—no ontology can think it
OG.linkedContent: originary supplement can’t be thought classically—no ontology can think it
